fullText: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical 'Harmony,' about a German singing group persecuted by the Nazis, finally makes it to Broadway after decades of development.
dtliExcerpt: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical 'Harmony,' about a German singing group persecuted by the Nazis, finally makes it to Broadway after decades of development.
